text: Nigeria was first at the Olympic Games in 1952. They have been in every Summer Olympic Games since then, except for the boycotted 1976 Summer Olympics. The nation has never been in the Winter Olympic Games. The National Olympic Committee for Nigeria was formed in 1951. ==Medalists== Medal Name Games Sport Event 1964 Tokyo Boxing Men's light middleweight 1972 Munich Boxing Men's light heavyweight 1984 Los
